dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation]
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2005 6:38 PM
To: james_wood@dsl.pipex.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
- --
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright Violation
Date:         Thu, 27 Jan 2005 00:12:57 -0000
From:         James Wood <james_wood@dsl.pipex.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



Hello, under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) i am contacting

you regarding a site i believe you're hosting that currently holds a

template design they do not own. The offending site is

www.xtremecomputing.co.uk.



There ns servers seem to be pointing to an ip number that eventually
pointed me in your direction:
http://www.networksolutions.com/en_US/whois/results.jhtml;jsessionid=QVQK5MF
OEEHTICWKEAQSFEY?whoistoken=0&_requestid=1374569

<http://www.networksolutions.com/en_US/whois/results.jhtml;jsessionid=QVQK5M
FOEEHTICWKEAQSFEY?whoistoken=0&_requestid=1374569>





The design they are using is not there's, it is mine and i will be able to

back this up with proof. Please email me so we can discuss this further as

all i want is for xtremecomputing to replace my graphical design with

there own and all is well.



I'm currently trying to persuade them to take it off but i doubt this will

Work.



I hope you take this sort of thing very seriously and i truly hope you can

help me solve this annoying problem.



Thanks very much,



James Wood
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFB+DfVvK/XpJs6oyURAsbMAKCF15l9cb6RWj1tmrB4pJKrPNnVjQCeL9Wi
HobPbQEhO1M3FC14WnnRXEo=
=vfhd
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
